title: which blocks this attack
extract: DEFINITION of 51% Attack. 51% attack refers to an attack on a blockchain – usually bitcoin's, for which such an attack is still hypothetical – by a group of miners controlling more than 50% of the network's mining hashrate, or computing power.Jul 5, 2018
extract_html: DEFINITION of 51% Attack. 51% attack refers to an attack on a blockchain – usually bitcoin's, for which such an attack is still hypothetical – by a group of miners controlling more than 50% of the network's mining hashrate, or computing power.Jul 5, 2018
